page.title: 18Transport and Travel(Cont.)
page.content: one-car, and in many cases,two car families. For most people, a car is not a convenience, but a neccessity. It would seem to be a fact,not merely a convention, that the standard of living could not be maintained without some form of personal transport, and as the{family}is the accepted unit, a car is the most important form of transport. It is needed for getting to work, for shopping, for pleasure, and (the most important consideration appears to be this) for transporting teenage offspring to meetings, friends,parties,out of school activities etc.
